positions.question: Open-Source AI model gets perfect IMO 2026 score?
positions.reasoning: Perfect IMO score (42/42) requires solving P3 and P6. Open-source models significantly behind frontier. Even AlphaProof only got gold (28/42), not perfect.

positions.question: Perfect score achieved by an AI model in the International Math Olympiad (IMO) 2026?
positions.reasoning: Gap from gold (4/6) to perfect (6/6) is qualitatively different. P3/P6 solvable by <10% of IMO participants. 68% seems overpriced.
